name: aws-api-lambda
description: Minimalist AWS API Gateway and AWS Lambda starter kit

scripts.dist: rm -f dist.zip && zip -jq dist.zip build/index.js && zip -rq dist.zip node_modules
scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name Example --role arn:aws:iam::9999999999:role/ExecuteLambda --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs6.10 --zip-file fileb://dist.zip --publish
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --invocation-type RequestResponse --function-name Example --region us-east-1 --log-type None --payload file://event.json outfile.json && cat outfile.json

author: Your Name Here
